price: Kwa hakika watu hawa wanapenda maisha ya kidunia, na wanaiacha nyuma yao siku nzito.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا
footnotes: Hakika hawa makafiri wanaipenda dunia, na wanaifadhilisha kuliko Akhera. Na wanaiacha migongoni mwao siku yenye misiba mikubwa, na vitisho vikali. Wala wao hawajui nini cha kuwaokoa wao na hayo!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna hāulāi yuḥibbūna al-ʿājilata wayadharūna warāahum yawman thaqīlan
